name: Bite Harder
description:
Bite Harder is a supplement for Bite Marks, the game of werewolf pack dynamics.

Bite Harder includes two new playbooks:

  • The Heir - your birthright is to one day become alpha. But will the rest of the pack follow you?
  • The Big Bad Wolf - you are a feral, untamed beast. But are you really comfortable living in the pack?

In addition, it includes new expanded rules for Howl rituals and moves, and a weird custom move for an otherworldly supernatural threat.
